- #+BEGIN_QUERY
  {
   :query [:find (pull ?p [*])
                  :where
                  [?p :block/properties ?pr]
                  [(get ?pr :public) ?t]
                  [(= true ?t)]
                  [?p :block/file _]]
   }
  #+END_QUERY
- query-table:: true
-
- #+BEGIN_QUERY
  {
   :title [:h2 "All Pages"]
   :query [:find (pull ?p [*])
                  :where
                  [?p :block/journal? false]
                  [?p :block/file _]] 
  }
  #+END_QUERY
-
